column1: Table 2-1. States or jurisdictions that did not report to the Arrest-Related Deaths Program, 2003–11
Report Title: Arrest-Related Deaths Program Data Quality Profile
Author(s): Michael Planty and Andrea M. Burch
Note: States not listed reported to the ARD program in each year from 2003 through 2011.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Arrest-Related Deaths Program, 2011.
